name: Full Proof (V.2.16.23)
description:
My first time coding! A short, text-only, choose your own adventure game about moonshining in the backwoods.

I wanted to learn how to code and taught myself python so that I could take a break from writing sub-par books and try out some digital storytelling.

With this first release version I'm just hoping to get some feedback on how it performs as a super duper entry level text-only game. It took somewhere between 20 and 30 hours to complete, so I'm sure there's plenty of room for improvement even without making fundamental changes.
